gdrive.code_description: To obtain authenticate code, please navigate to Link. Click and navigate to . Press to proceed. Finally copy code to below field and press ok to authenticate
gdrive.description: To obtain Google Drive 'Client ID' / 'Client secret', open Link. You may leave project name by default. On next page select 'Desktop app'. Click create. Copy Client ID/Client secret to correspond fields. Then fire 'OAuth2 Authenticate' in context menu to fetch Google Drive 'Code' and paste it to field.
